## Bioinformatics Resources

Depending on your project, you may find some of the following resources useful: 

[How to Access Data from Public Databases](https://sipbs-compbiol.github.io/BM432/notebooks/02-03-public_databases.html)
[Links to some key public databases](https://sipbs-compbiol.github.io/BM432/notebooks/database_list.html). Please report any broken links to Dr. Feeney. 
[Get Started with GitHub documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started)
